text: ahasda, bhūmiyada, ohugē niyōgayaṭa anuva sthīrava tibīmada, ohugē sādhakayangen æti dæyayi. (obaṭa niyama karanu læbū kālaya dakvā oba ehi jīvat vī maraṇayaṭa pat vū pasu bhūmiyehi bhūmadānaya karanu læbīmen) pasuda ohu obava kæn̆davuvahot ekama eka śabdayakin evelēma oba bhūmiyen ikut vanu labannehuya
